WorkItem.Description: Burnished & Gleaming Quel'Serrar no longer have their procs, and the item editor no longer allows addition of PPM effects.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Setting PPM effects can cause crash

Comments.Message: Err, the item editor definitely does allow the addition of PPM effects. And for those items, try refreshing them from Armory or Wowhead; one or the other may have had bad data.

My mistake on the PPM thing.  I apologize.  I had posted this in a review earlier, so I went back and edited it accordingly.

Refreshing the item data from Armory and Wowhead did not add the proc back in.  I confirmed this on two separate computers.  However, when the proc is added manually it works as before.
